metadata.name: Uncommon Sigverif.EXE Child Process
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon child processes spawning from "sigverif.exe", which could indicate potential abuse of the latter as a living of the land binary in order to proxy execution.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\sigverif.exe')) AND NOT (lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('c:\\windows\\system32\\werfault\.exe', 'c:\\windows\\syswow64\\werfault\.exe')))

output.summary: Detects uncommon child processes spawning from "sigverif.exe", which could indicate potential abuse of the latter as a living of the land binary in order to proxy execution.
